channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: India’s TCS gets TPG to fund half of $2B AI data center project
item.description: TCS and private equity firm TPG will invest up to $2 billion to build data centers for AI training and inference in India.

item.title: ChatGPT launches group chats globally
item.description: The company sees group chats in ChatGPT as a way for people to coordinate trips, co-write documents, settle debates, or work through research together...

item.title: Salesforce says some of its customers’ data was accessed after Gainsight breach
item.description: Salesforce said it’s investigating an incident where hackers compromised some of its customers' data after breaching customer experience company Gains...

item.title: The Best N95, KF94, and KN95 Face Masks (2025)
item.description: Flu season is here. Here are the best disposable face coverings we’ve tested—and where you can find them.

item.title: Another fire breaks out at aluminum plant that supplies Ford
item.description: It's the second major fire -- and the third overall -- in the last few months at the Novelis plant in Oswego, NY.

item.title: Spotify’s latest feature lets you transfer playlists from other services
item.description: Spotify has partnered with TuneMyMusic on a new in-app feature that lets users import their playlists from other streaming services.

item.title: Source: Kalshi’s valuation jumps to $11B after raising massive $1B round
item.description: The quickly growing prediction betting market raised fresh capital from Sequoia and CapitalG, according to someone familiar with the deal.

item.title: As its voice dictation app takes off, Wispr secures $25M from Notable Capital
item.description: Voice AI company Wispr is raising $25 million in funding merely months after its $30 million Series A.

item.title: WhatsApp gets its own Instagram Notes-like feature
item.description: WhatsApp users can now share their status with others through a new "About" feature.

item.title: Why these founders ditched social ads for Taylor Swift concerts and prison tablets
item.description: Two founders share their stories on how they approached two very different markets: teens in need of well-being advice, and formerly incarcerated indi...
